page.title: 16THE LIVE-AID CONCERT
page.content: Last Saturday 13th July there was a great concert held which was televised and seen in 147 countries world wide. It was supposed to be the greatest concert ever to have taken place on Earth. It was a fund raising event in aid of the starving people in Africa. The concert went on for as long as 16 hours. From 12 p.m until 10 p.m it was held at Wembley Stadium, then it went over to Philadelphia in the USA. Our class on average liked the pop_star Paul Young the best. The pop_stars were very good they worked very hard to raise money for the hungry people. There were crowds and crowds of people watching so everybody must have been very nervous. Now people are making donations everyday. Â£50 million pounds has been raised so far, world wide.
